column4: does anybody know a nice gtk app to convert videos to ipod touch 1g format?
you might want to check out Handbrake (it's not in the default repository however), there is a PPA
at least not from the ppas i've found so far
sorry i don't have any other suggestions.  Good luck.
maybe it's a bit shameful but i'll try to use the win version of handbrake under wine :)
